Name: Strawberry Cosmo
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of a fresh strawberry.
Review: Strawberry liqueur replaces the usual orange liqueur in this riff on a classic Cosmopolitan .
Nutrition: One serving of Strawberry Cosmo contains 194 calories
